author: Alex Perry
title: Facebook to redirect people who like false coronavirus info to WHO website
description: Facebook is taking a small step to stop the spread of coronavirus misinformation. The company announced a new anti-misinformation measure it's taking in a company blog post on Thursday morning. Any user who likes or otherwise interacts with material that Face…
content:
Facebook is taking a small step to stop the spread of coronavirus misinformation.
